task.title: Remove The Drawband
task.shortdesc: To repair or replace the drawband or mainspring, you must first remove the drawband from the spring barrel.

step.cmd: Locate the point of connection where the drawband meets the mainspring barrel.
step.info: The spring's end has a knot or metal hook attached to the mainspring barrel by sliding into a thin slot through a hole in the barrel. The hole is sufficient for removal of the knot/hook, but the narrow slot holds the knot/hook in place.

step.cmd: Grab the end of the drawband with a pair of needle nosed pliers and gently slide the drawband out of the thin barrel slot. Guide the drawband out of the mainspring barrel through the drawband barrel hole.
